ThingDef.label: Wooden Pallet
ThingDef.description: A Wooden Pallet, easy to build and allowing a standardized storage.

ThingDef.Name: SadjuukPowerConduit
ThingDef.label: Power Conduit
ThingDef.description: High voltage power cable.

ThingDef.label: Wall firefoam popper
ThingDef.description: Safety device poping and spraying a fire-retardant foam around itself.

ThingDef.label: Wood Generator
ThingDef.description: P : 1500W A very rustic generator, using water steam as source of power.

ThingDef.label: Fuel Oil Generator D
ThingDef.description: P : 2250W A rustic and simple fuel oil generator, using a reliable combustion engine coupled with an alternator to generate electricity. Fuel Oil power generation with this engine is 10% more efficient than Chemfuel. Highly explosive if damaged.

ThingDef.label: Fuel Oil Generator A
ThingDef.description: P : 12000W A rustic version of the standard UN Fuel Oil generator FGEN12K. Good production rate. Fuel Oil power generation with this engine is 15% more efficient than Chemfuel. Highly explosive if damaged.

ThingDef.label: Fuel Oil Generator B
ThingDef.description: P : 12000W The industrial version of the UN Fuel Oil generator FGEN12K. Double injection system, double filtration system, High production rate. Fuel Oil power generation with this engine is 20% more efficient than Chemfuel. Highly explosive if damaged.

ThingDef.label: Armored Generator F
ThingDef.description: P : 2250W An industrial Diesel generator, using a reliable combustion engine coupled with an alternator to generate electricity. Very good production rate. Diesel power generation with this engine is 35% more efficient than Chemfuel. Highly explosive if damaged.

ThingDef.label: Armored Generator G
ThingDef.description: P : 6000W An industrial Diesel generator, using a reliable combustion engine coupled with an alternator to generate electricity. Very good production rate. Diesel power generation with this engine is 40% more efficient than Chemfuel. Highly explosive if damaged.

ThingDef.label: Armored Generator N
ThingDef.description: P : 3000W Military 3kW armored Diesel generator. UNSC standard, foolproof design, high production rate. Diesel power generation with this engine is 40% more efficient than Chemfuel. Highly explosive if damaged.

ThingDef.label: Armored Generator M
ThingDef.description: P : 6000W Military 6kW armored Diesel generator. UNSC standard, foolproof design, high production rate. Diesel power generation with this engine is 40% more efficient than Chemfuel. Highly explosive if damaged.

ThingDef.label: Large Fuel Cell
ThingDef.description: P : 3200W Fuel Cell that converts the chemical energy into electricity through an electrochemical reaction of hydrogen fuel with oxygen. Hydrogen Fuel cell power generation is 67% more efficient than Chemfuel.

ThingDef.label: Portable Generator V
ThingDef.description: P : 750W A Diesel portable generator. Low capacity tank, low power but sufficient for most nomadic situations. Diesel power generation with this engine is 10% more efficient than Chemfuel.

ThingDef.label: Portable Generator W
ThingDef.description: P : 750W A military Diesel generator. UNSC standard, low capacity but portable, foolproof design, high production rate. Diesel power generation with this engine is 10% more efficient than Chemfuel.

ThingDef.label: Portable Fuel Cell X
ThingDef.description: P : 800W A Portable Fuel Cell that converts the chemical energy into electricity through an electrochemical reaction of hydrogen fuel with oxygen. Hydrogen Fuel cell power generation is 67% more efficient than Chemfuel.

ThingDef.label: Solar Panel A
ThingDef.description: Photovoltaic solar panels absorbing sunlight as a source of energy to generate electricity. Size of the installation : 4X4.

ThingDef.label: Solar Panel B
ThingDef.description: Photovoltaic solar panels absorbing sunlight as a source of energy to generate electricity. Size of the installation : 5X3.

ThingDef.label: Solar Panel C
ThingDef.description: Photovoltaic solar panels absorbing sunlight as a source of energy to generate electricity. Size of the installation : 7X2.

ThingDef.label: Metalworking Bench
ThingDef.description: Very basic Metalworking Bench.

ThingDef.label: Bessemer Converter
ThingDef.description: First inexpensive industrial process for the mass production of steel. Obsolete since the development of the open hearth furnace.

ThingDef.label: Open Hearth Furnace
ThingDef.description: Furnace where excess carbon and other impurities are burnt out of pig iron to produce steel.

ThingDef.label: Electric Arc Furnace
ThingDef.description: Furnace that heats charged material by means of an electric arc. Very high production rate.

ThingDef.label: Metalworking Line
ThingDef.description: The Metalworking Line is a very versatile production line to work the metal.

ThingDef.label: Shaper Tool
ThingDef.description: Metalworking Line Upgrade. A Shaper tool. Its most common use is to machine straight flat surfaces, but with ingenuity and some accessories a wide range of work can be done. Production Factor : 0.20, 1 per line max.

ThingDef.label: Grinding Machine
ThingDef.description: Metalworking Line Upgrade. A Grinding Machine used to finish workpieces that must show high surface quality and high accuracy of shape and dimension. Production Factor : 0.40, 1 per line max.

ThingDef.label: Welding Robot
ThingDef.description: Metalworking Line Upgrade. A mechanized programmable tool, completely automating a welding process by both performing the weld and handling the part. Production Factor : 0.80, 2 per line max.

ThingDef.label: Assembly Line
ThingDef.description: The Assembly Line is a production line allowing to assemble a wide variety of components.

ThingDef.label: Metal Lathe
ThingDef.description: Assembly Line Upgrade. Machine tool removing material from a rotating workpiece via the movements of various cutting tools. Production Factor : 0.20, 1 per line max.

ThingDef.label: Milling Machine
ThingDef.description: Assembly Line Upgrade. A Milling Machine that removes material from a workpiece by advancing the cutter into the workpiece. Production Factor : 0.40, 1 per line max.

ThingDef.label: Assembly Robot
ThingDef.description: Assembly Line Upgrade. A multi-role robot capable of assembling, picking, and packing with a high endurance, speed, and precision. Production Factor : 0.80, 2 per line max.

ThingDef.label: Construction Machinery
ThingDef.description: A very complex machinery capable of extracting silicon from the rock and coarsely refining organic elements to produce glass, concrete and asphalt.

ThingDef.label: Fuel Oil Refinery
ThingDef.description: Medium capacity Fuel Oil Refinery. Good efficiency, far from conventional industrial capabilities but known as reliable and versatile. The Fuel Oil has a better calorific power than chemfuel, allowing the construction of 20% more efficient generators.

ThingDef.label: Diesel Refinery
ThingDef.description: Medium capacity Diesel Refinery. The Diesel has a better calorific power than chemfuel, allowing the construction of 50% more efficient generators.

ThingDef.label: Advanced Refinery
ThingDef.description: Advanced Refinery allowing the production of complex components like explosives or liquid hydrogen. The Liquid Hydrogen has a better calorific power than chemfuel, allowing the construction of 80% more efficient generators.
